comment.body:
I enjoy your take on Namecoin. One thing I would add is that there is an ongoing paradigm shift from blindly trusting with child-like naivety to self-sovereignty in all respects ie. control your keys :) The internet will be no different. 

There have been teething problems but technology such as Namecoin is developing consistently. Zeronet has offered a playground for its use for some time and there will be other projects that embrace it as well.

A key point is that the cheap price of Namecoin is an issue insofar that people do not value what a .bit is offering. This will change with time.
